title.en: Comic M Hayakawa Publishing 70th Anniversary Comic Anthology [Mystery] Edition

description.en:
Publisher Hayakawa is celebrating its 70th anniversary with two manga anthology reprints. One collection is dedicated to mystery works while the other compiles sci-fi stories printed over the publisher's long career.

[list][*]"Mugen Shinshi (Shutchou-hen) Zashiki Oni" by Yosuke Takahashi (p. April 2011 issue Mystery Magazine)
[*]"Kao" by Yosuke Takahashi (p. April 2011 issue Mystery Magazine)
[*]"Holmes-kun no Himitsu" by Meiko Komichi (p. September 1987 issue Mystery Magazine)
[*]"Holmes Kimi no Tsuitachi" by Mizumaru Anzai (p. September 1987 issue Mystery Magazine)
[*]"Soiukimiha" by Taku Furukawa (p. September 1987 issue Mystery Magazine)
[*]"Holmes Kimi no Iraijin o Sagase!" by Eiji Yokoyama (p. February 1995 issue Mystery Magazine)
[*]"Karera" by Jun Ishikawa (p. July 1994 issue Mystery Magazine)
[*]"Kowarete Iru ka"" by Yoshihisa Tagami (p. August 2001 issue Mystery Magazine)
[*]"Yuurei Shitsuji Bangai-hen Soshite Dare mo Inakunattari Shinai" by Yasuko Sakata
[*]"Soshite Minna Iru" by Izumi Okaya
[*]"Ai no Machikado" by Tsuyako Haraniku (p. July 2007 issue Mystery Magazine)
[*]"Soshite Dare ka Inaku natta" by Shinji Ohara
[*]"Inu wa Kanjou Shikiremasen" by Chuuya Chikazawa
[*]"Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy" by Keita Yatera
[*]"Koko Chiyoi Basho" by Asami Shimoda
[*]"Seinaru Shinnyuu" by Masakazu Ishiguro
[*]"Mahou Shoujo Time-chan Sono 2 Jiryuuya no Kai Jiken" by Akihito Yoshitomi
[*]"To, Aru Hi no Watashi to Takeru" by Natsujikei Miyazaki
[*]"Mugen Shinshi (Eigyou-hen) Come Mad and Go--Saa Ki Chigai ni Narinasai" by Yosuke Takahashi[/list]
